oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Portrait photograph of James M. Buchanan as Naval officer
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Black and white formal portrait photograph of James M. Buchanan during his service in the U.S. Navy during World War II. He joined the Navy after completing his bachelors degree at Middle Tennessee State Teachers College and his masters at the University of Tennessee-Knoxville. He served on the staff of Adm. Chester W. Nimitz.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Buchanan, James M.
